text: Sipas Alloh ʙa Zoti ʙuzurgvoraş savgand jod namud, ki nest amr cunon ki onho gumon meʙarand, ki onho mū'minonand va ʙa'd az on ʙa hukmi tu rozī nameşavand va turo dar hamai ixtilofoti xud hokim qaror namedihand. Va ʙojad malole az hukmi tu dar dili xud nadoşta va komilan taslim ʙoşand. (Ixtijor namudani hukmi Rasul sallallohu alajhi va sallam va rozī ʙudan va taslim şudan ʙa on ci ovardaast az nazdi Alloh dar hama holathoi hajot az nişonai sidqi imon ast)
